wikipedia_page.main: Alvin Ryan Bubb (born 11 October 1980) is a Grenadian international footballer who plays as a left winger.

response: He is the cousin of fellow player Alvin Bubb. His brother, Bradley, is also a footballer.
* Alvin Bubb (born 1980), Grenadian footballer and cousin of Byron
Bubb is the younger brother of Byron Bubb, and cousin to Alvin Bubb.
